page.title: 03One week in Fauldhouse 1985
page.content: {OUTING }Nearly 100 members of the Golden Friendship Club and friends last Saturday travelled to Dundee.They had lunch at Broughty Ferry. {CLUB }Proposals to start a swimming club are being considered by the Community Centre management committee. {RACES}A fund raising race night was held by the Cricket Club last night (Thursday). {TULIPS}Mrs Sandra Ray,warden at the Bield sheltered houses ,was angry last week after vandals raided a garden at the complex and uprooted a number of tulips. {RUNNER}James Ritchie of Barton Terrace has completed two more long distance races to raise money for Cancer Research. His latest efforts were in the Motherwell Marathon and the Pearl Insurance half Marathon.
